sentences.en: A kilogram of garlic sausage, please.
A metre is a measure of length and a kilogram is a measure of weight.
sentences.cn: 米是长度单位,公斤是重量单位.

sentences.en: A metre is a unit of length and a kilogram is a unit of weight.
sentences.cn: 米是长度单位,而公斤是重量单位.

sentences.en: Apple costs five dollars a kilogram.
Apple costs five yuan a kilogram.
By comparison, one kilogram of tomatoes requires 160 litres of water.
sentences.cn: 相比之下，生产一公斤的番茄需要160升水。

sentences.en: For example, the kilogram scale allows you to assign a number to an object indicating its weight based upon standardized displacements of measuring instruments.
sentences.cn: 例如，千克尺度允许您给一个物体分配数字，根据测量仪器的标准化的偏移量指示该物体的重量。

sentences.en: I guessed it was not more than 5 kilogram.
sentences.cn: 我估摸了一下,它顶多能宰十来斤肉.
一公斤等于 二点二 磅.

sentences.en: One thousand grams are equal to one kilogram.
Start her on I. V. Chloramphenicol, 25 milligrams per kilogram, four times a day.
sentences.cn: 给她静脉注射每千克25毫克的抗生素氯霉素, 每天四次.

sentences.en: The kilogram is the international standard of weight.
sentences.cn: 公斤是国际通用的重量标准.

sentences.en: The largest brain possessed by any dinosaur weighed about a kilogram.
sentences.cn: 最大的恐龙脑子大约有一公斤重.

sentences.en: The measuring unit of torque wrench is pound - inch or kilogram - centimeter.
sentences.cn: 力矩扳手的计量单位为镑 - 寸或者公斤 - 厘米.

sentences.en: The pressure maintained in the water main is two kilogram per square centimeter.
sentences.cn: 自来水总管里的水压保持为2公斤/平方厘米.

sentences.en: The standard kilogram is maintained as a measure of mass.
sentences.cn: 标准的千克是测量质量的量度.

sentences.en: There are 1000 grams in a kilogram.

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 1,000 grams
a unit for measuring weight, equal to 1,000 grams
